03572c6c3ba27c5b159f4d318c5c9f661704a508:
query GetCockpitSession($id: ID!) {
  cockpitSession(id: $id) {
    id
    isAudienceInteractionActive
    isModerationEnabled
    isGamificationEnabled
    namespace
    name
    displayName
    status
    startedAt
    course {
      id
      displayName
      __typename
    }
    blocks {
      id
      order
      status
      expiresAt
      timeLimit
      randomSelection
      execution
      instances {
        id
        questionData {
          id
          name
          type
          content
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    activeBlock {
      id
      __typename
    }
    confusionFeedbacks {
      speed
      difficulty
      numberOfParticipants
      __typename
    }
    feedbacks {
      id
      isPublished
      isPinned
      isResolved
      content
      votes
      createdAt
      resolvedAt
      responses {
        id
        content
        positiveReactions
        negativeReactions
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
407026a69671ae390681d118d9aeee40e655db66:
query GetSingleCourse($courseId: ID!) {
  course(id: $courseId) {
    id
    isArchived
    pinCode
    name
    displayName
    description
    color
    numOfParticipants
    numOfActiveParticipants
    averageScore
    averageActiveScore
    sessions {
      id
      name
      displayName
      isGamificationEnabled
      pinCode
      accessMode
      status
      createdAt
      numOfBlocks
      numOfQuestions
      __typename
    }
    learningElements {
      id
      name
      displayName
      numOfInstances
      __typename
    }
    microSessions {
      id
      name
      displayName
      scheduledStartAt
      scheduledEndAt
      numOfInstances
      __typename
    }
    leaderboard {
      id
      score
      rank
      username
      avatar
      participation {
        isActive
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
